name: Khaleel Ahmad
headline: Data (Platform) Engineer | Masters of Artificial Intelligence | AI/ML | AWS Cloud | VMware ESXI | Python/MSSQL | Kubernetes (CKA)
about:
Infrastructure and Data (Platform) Engineer with 3+ years of hands-on experience managing on-premise and cloud environments. Currently pursuing M.Sc. in Artificial Intelligence at BTU Cottbus-Senftenberg.Core Expertise: Infrastructure Management with Terraform and Ansible managing VMware ESXi, vCenter and AWS and building Data Pipelines (Python, MSSQL, TSQL, Apache Airflow)- Automation (IaC): Terraform, Ansible, Python scripting- Container Orchestration: Kubernetes (CKA Certified)- Networking & Security: VPN configuration, network switches, storage management- Monitoring Operations: Custom Python monitoring solutions for hardware and system healthHybrid Experience: I've worked at the intersection of infrastructure and data engineering, giving me unique insight into building and maintaining platforms that support data-intensive workloads. I understand both the infrastructure layer and the applications running on top.Actively targeting Data Platform and MLOps Infrastructure roles in Germany. I am leveraging my Data Engineering background and M.Sc. in AI focus to drive reliable data delivery. Eager to apply deep hands-on experience in VMware virtualization, Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform/Ansible), and Kubernetes (CKA-certified) skills to cloud-native platformsOpen to full-time roles and working student (Werkstudent) positions.Infrastructure and Data (Platform) Engineer with 3+ years of hands-on experience managing on-premise and cloud environments. Currently pursuing M.Sc. in Artificial Intelligence at BTU Cottbus-Senftenberg.

Core Expertise: Infrastructure Management with Terraform and Ansible managing VMware ESXi, vCenter and AWS and building Data Pipelines (Python, MSSQL, TSQL, Apache Airflow)

- Automation (IaC): Terraform, Ansible, Python scripting
- Container Orchestration: Kubernetes (CKA Certified)
- Networking & Security: VPN configuration, network switches, storage management
- Monitoring Operations: Custom Python monitoring solutions for hardware and system health

Hybrid Experience: I've worked at the intersection of infrastructure and data engineering, giving me unique insight into building and maintaining platforms that support data-intensive workloads. I understand both the infrastructure layer and the applications running on top.

Actively targeting Data Platform and MLOps Infrastructure roles in Germany. I am leveraging my Data Engineering background and M.Sc. in AI focus to drive reliable data delivery. 

Eager to apply deep hands-on experience in VMware virtualization, Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform/Ansible), and Kubernetes (CKA-certified) skills to cloud-native platformsOpen to full-time roles and working student (Werkstudent) positions.
